parameters.name: HostGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the host group that you want to query. Only exact match is supported.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host to query.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~462953~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host in which you want to query the host group.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
